    • Method Detail

      • calcLifeInsurance

        public double calcLifeInsurance(int totalMonths)
                         throws IncorrectMonthException
        This method calculates the life insurance value of the individual person. If totalMonths is 42, which is equivalent to 3 years and 6 months. The method should return the sum of the number of years times the return value of the calcYearlyInstallment() method and the number of months times the return value of the calcMontlyInstallment() method.
        Specified by:
        calcLifeInsurance in interface Health
        Overrides:
        calcLifeInsurance in class HealthInsurance
        Parameters:
        totalMonths - The number of months.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of life insurance calculation.
        Throws:
        IncorrectMonthException - If the totalMonths is less than 0.

      • calcMontlyInstallment

        public double calcMontlyInstallment()
        This method calculates the monthly installment value of the individual person. If the persons age is less than or equal to 10.00 or greater than or equal to 60.00, then the method should return the difference of the monthly installment and the 20% of the monthly installment; else the method should return the monthly installment value
        Returns:
        Returns the value of monthly installment calculation.

      • calcYearlyInstallment

        public double calcYearlyInstallment()
        This method calculates the yearly installment value of the individual person. If the persons age is less than or equal to 10.00 or greater than or equal to 60.00, then the method should return the difference of the yearly installment of one time payment and the 20% of the yearly installment of one time payment; else the method should return the yearly installment of one time payment value.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of yearly installment calculation.

      • calcExemption

        public double calcExemption(int totalMonths)
                     throws IncorrectMonthException
        This method calculates the exemption amount value of the individual person. The method should return the difference of the calcLifeInsurance() method value in it's super class and the value of calcLifeInsurance() method.
        Parameters:
        totalMonths - The number of months.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of Exemption calculation.
        Throws:
        IncorrectMonthException - If the totalMonths is less than 0.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The string representation consists of the person, calcMontlyInstallment() and the calcYearlyInstallment(). Please refer to the word document for the sample output
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of the object.
